Brain-Computer Music Interfacing

IBVA-SuperCollider interface

Feb 24, 2018


GitHub repository here.

In 2018 Fredik Olofsson was added as an external advisor to the supervisory team. He introduced me to GitHub while making a SuperCollider class that acquires raw EEG signals from the 2 channel IBVA (BlueVAS) EEG hardware. I have tested this interface, with other devices e.g. NeuroSky and Emotiv to help find the most suitable EEG for the research and later this year decided to pause development to be able to focus on developing the OpenBCI-SuperCollider interface with Fredik.
